review: F'ING ROCKS!!!!  So this is my second  streaming media box, first was the NEO TV.  This Amazon Fire is awesome,  they have really outdone themselves with this one.  The processor that they are using is quick, no lag between what you ask it to do and what it does.  When you leave a show it goes immediately to the menu, fastforward is actually that, fast and forward.Simple straightforward controller allows you to navigate quickly and it has voice recognition.  This isn't like Siri,  when you ask it something it hears you loud and clear.  I haven't had to repeat myself yet and I don't think I will have to with this Fire TV.  Simple set up for those technologically declined people out there should have you watching TV within minutes....no joke.  Combine this media box with Amazon Prime and you get free movies and TV for just 100 dollars a year,  feels like your stealing from the cable companies finally.  I have never written this much in a review.....that is how good Fire TV is.
